dt-example.title: Limit Sub-Group Depth
dt-example.info:
This example demonstrates the behaviour of `-init searchBuilder` when the `-init searchBuilder.depthLimit` is set to limit how deep the Sub-Groups can be nested.
The top level is considered the first level. Setting a `-init searchBuilder.depthLimit` of 2 would allow for criteria to be indented by 1 level as this would then be at the second level - the limit. In this example a `-init searchBuilder.depthLimit` of 2 is set.
